Kurt arrives home after a long, hard day at the office and is hoping to have some close, personal time with his wife, who he loves so, so much. But when he pulls off the covers blanketing the warm figure in their bed -- whoops! -- it's not his wife! It's his wife's best friend Avril Hall! How in the heck did she get in there?! Well, nobody knows for sure, but what we do know is that she's hot, horny and practically sucking Kurt's dick already since she tells him that she's wanted him ever since the wedding, and that his wife is currently at her sister's house for the weekend. Nevermind that Kurt didn't know any of this, he's ready to fuck his wife's hot friend!!!
